name: Contacts (itch)
description:
an intentionally annoying game about trying to put your contact lenses in.

NOTE: you need a controller to play this game!
(I've tested with Xbox controllers, PS might work)

Left stick move your finger. Try to move the lens over your pupil.
X button picks up the lens when your finger is over it.
Left and right triggers control your top and bottom eyelids respectively. Match the sliders with trigger pressure.
Right stick controls finger pressure. Move your finger (slowly) forward to push the lens in, when your eyelids are open and the lens is over your pupil.
